column2: I don't see what all the fuss is about.  I went on a Wednesday morning
column3: and was seated right away.  The service was good
column4: but I didn't think the food was anything to write home about.  I had the migas with chorizo and an iced tea.  It was just....uninspired.  The potatoes seemed processed (from the frozen foods aisle); I doubt they are homemade.  I wouldn't come back here.  I also don't like super cramped spaces
column5: and Baby Barnaby's is nothing if not cramped.  The other people there were super nice to me
column7: so yeah for Montrose and for Houston
